content:
Microsoft announced two open-source releases today: IoMT FHIR Connector for Azure and a FHIR Healthkit Framework for iOS. Overview at https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/accelerate-iomt-on-fhir-with-new-microsoft-oss-connector/

For those at Dev Days this week, @Dustin Burson and @Nathan Malubay will be presenting this work Friday morning (tutorial + let's build session).

For follow-up discussion, please use #implementers > Microsoft OSS Releases (Internet of Medical Things) :-)
